metadata.description: Ghouls live among us, the same as normal people in every way-except their craving for human flesh. Ken Kaneki is an ordinary college student until a violent encounter turns him into the first half-human half-ghoul hybrid. Trapped between two worlds, he must survive Ghoul turf wars, learn more about Ghoul society and master his new powers. Enjoy this sneak peek of Tokyo Ghoul volume 1 along with an inside look of Tokyo Ghoul volume 2.
metadata.name: Tokyo Ghoul
